HTLProceduralAPI

Class HTLProceduralAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.BaseCode
      • Engine.LibraryCode
        • TowerDefense.HTL
          • HTLProceduralAPI.HTLProceduralAPI

  • public class HTLProceduralAPI
extends TowerDefense.HTL
    This is a functional API for the game Hug The Line (HTL). It is designed for use the introductory computer science lessons.
    Author:
    Kunlakan (Jeen) Cherdchusilp, Tom Lai

      • buildGame

        public void buildGame()
        The function to be overridden by the student. This method should be used to "build the game" by building key elements.

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        The function to be overridden by the student. This method should be used to "update the game" by updating key elements.

        type - Either "medic" or "speedy", case insensitive.

      • addPathUpDown

        public boolean addPathUpDown(int x,
                             int y)
        Marks the corresponding Tile as being a part of the Path, with the ability to connect to Tiles to the top and bottom. This means that when the Path is created using constructPath(), this Tile can be included in the Path.
        Parameters:
        column - Column of the Tile to include in the Path
        row - Row of the Tile to include in the Path
        Returns:
        True if Tile was successfully marked

      • addPathLeftRight

        public boolean addPathLeftRight(int x,
                                int y)
        Marks the corresponding Tile as being a part of the Path, with the ability to connect to Tiles to the left and right. This means that when the Path is created using constructPath(), this Tile can be included in the Path.
        Parameters:
        column - Column of the Tile to include in the Path
        row - Row of the Tile to include in the Path
        Returns:
        True if Tile was successfully marked
